pt.Name like '%${map.name}%'

mapper.insert: insert into Partners(Partner_ID, Name, Logo, URL, Introduction, Indexs, Admin_ID) values (#{id},#{name},#{logo},#{url},#{introduction},#{indexs},#{optId})
mapper.select: select Partner_ID,Name,Logo,URL,Introduction,Statu,Indexs,Admin_ID,CreateTime ,Opt_Date from Partners where Name=#{name} and Partner_ID != #{id}
mapper.update:
update Partners
Name=#{name},
Logo=#{logo},
URL=#{url},
Introduction=#{introduction},
Indexs=#{indexs},
Admin_ID=#{optId},
Opt_Date=now(),
where Partner_ID=#{id}
update Partners set Statu=#{statu} where Partner_ID=#{id}
